channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brain scientists are seeking weight-loss drugs without the nausea
item.description: Weight-loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound often cause nausea and other side effects. Brain scientists are looking for ways to solve this problem.

item.title: Former CDC official reacts to agency shifting stance on vaccines and autism

item.title: CDC claims — without evidence — there's a possible link between vaccines and autism
item.description: The CDC has changed its stance on vaccines and autism, claiming now there's a possible link. The claim, which has been widely debunked, alarmed doctor...

item.title: After Series of Denials, His Insurer Approved Doctor-Recommended Cancer Care. It Was Too Late.
item.description: Eric Tennant’s doctors recommended histotripsy, which would target, and potentially destroy, a cancerous tumor in his liver. But by the time his insur...

item.title: Cancer Stole Her Voice. She Used AI, Curse Words, and Kids’ Books To Get It Back.
item.description: After a total glossectomy and laryngectomy to treat her cancer, Sonya Sotinsky can no longer speak. She searched for a way to sound like herself again...

item.title: US Cancer Registries, Constrained by Trump Policies, To Recognize Only ‘Male’ or ‘Female’ Patients
item.description: Under Trump policies, cancer registries in 2026 will have to classify sex data strictly as male, female, or unknown, a change scientists and advocates...

item.title: Recalled baby formula linked to a botulism outbreak may still be in some stores
